name: Yeast Fermentation Experiment - ContentsDa Science Experiment
summary:
add the mango juice to the fermentation tube
add the yeast solution to the fermentation tube
add distilled water + yeast solution, grape juice + yeast solution, and grapefruit juice + yeast solution to the remaining three fermentation tubes.
place the four fermentation tubes in a water bath, add warm water and observe what happens in the foot fermentation tube.
observe the reaction between the juice and the yeast
the water level in the blind tube has lowered by the volume of carbon dioxide produced by...
